dm_disallow:
:thinking: You can't listen music in DirectMessage ;(
But I can be your wordless companion \:)
mention_call_2:
:musical_note: Do you need some help?
check out all the commands by typing `%1$shelp`!
give_me_heart_title: Plz press the :heart: to keep lofi girl alive!
give_me_heart_button_1: [:heart: press the heart!](%1$s "this will send you to the testing server")
give_me_heart_button_2: [:star: press the star!](%1$s "this will send you to Github")
give_me_heart_no_embed:
aw.. could you please press the single heart button..?
(you can use commands by pressing heart button)
%1$s
give_me_heart_description:
you can give a developer hope and dreams with single click
(If you have ever logged in to Koreanbots, you must press :heart: to enable command)
help_help: this shows you this help you're looking at
help_continue: you can turn over next page by pressing :triangular_flag_on_post:
invite_help: this shows the bot invite link and supportive servers link
leave_help: stops the stream which is playing and leave the voice channel
leave_no_voice: :thinking: I'm not on any channels already!
leave_force_question_1: :grey_question: it's on `%1$s` already! Do you still want me to come out?
leave_force_question_2: :grey_question: Someone else is listening to Lofi in `%1$s`. Do you still want me to come out?
leave_force_fail_1: :octagonal_sign: There's someone on the `%1$s` listening. I can't get out ;(
leave_force_fail_2: :octagonal_sign: There's someone on the `%1$s` listening. I can't get out ;(
mark_help: you can set up a channel to play Lo-Fi all the time.
mark_no_permission:
:rolling_eyes: uh... `%1$s`, you don't have permissions to set channels!
to use this command, you must have at least `manage channels` permissions to use
mark_no_voice: :loudspeaker: please try again enter the voice channel to always set to play.
mark_not_joinable: :microphone2: um.. I can't get into that voice channel. ;(
mark_not_speakable: :zipper_mouth: I don't have permission to speak on that voice channel. ;(
mark_success:
:ok_hand: I set it to play it at `%1$s`!
*tip: you can play right now with `%2$splay`
*tip: you can choose different track with `%2$strack`
ping_help: Measures and show us the speed of the communication delay.
play_help: Play a Lo-Fi stream with a set track
play_no_voice: :loudspeaker: Enter the voice channel you want to play and try again
play_not_joinable: :microphone2: um.. I can't get into that voice channel. ;(
play_not_speakable: :zipper_mouth: I don't have permission to speak on that voice channel. ;(
play_force_question: :grey_question: I'm already playing on `%1$s`! Want me to move?
theme_help: you can change the Lo-Fi track I'm going to play
theme_submit: [Want to add your song but it isn't here? Click here.](%1$s)
track_play_force_question:
:grey_question: already turned on at `%1$s`, do you want change track immediately?
*if you don't want it, track will changed when all listeners are left
track_play_force_fail: :grey_exclamation: already turned on at `%1$s`, I'll change track when all listeners are left
